verses.name: John 5:25
verses.text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, The hour is coming, and now is, when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God: and they that hear shall live.

verses.name: John 5:26
verses.text: For as the Father hath life in himself; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself;

verses.name: John 5:27
verses.text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also, because he is the Son of man.

verses.name: John 5:28
verses.text: Marvel not at this: for the hour is coming, in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice,
